column3: NACK for the same reason as here: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/20550#issuecomment-737820067.\n\nWe shouldn't make error handling worse in Bitcoin Core to make life easier for maintainers of downstream projects.
Closing for now due to controversy
I think you are overcomplicating this. No need for a +53-7 patch when this line could be removed in a -1+0 patch to achieve the same user experience
